content: gidday baby a knitting pattern by georgie nicolson in australia gidday is a colloquial term for hello while we do say hello too our most common salutation is gidday we may even greet a new baby with the phrase gidday little fella this cardigan is perfect for welcoming babies into this world or into your heart knit top-down and seamlessly it features simple increases in a striped garter stitch circular yoke the pattern is supported by a series of blog posts making it perfect for both beginners and those wishing to polish their skills sized for chest measurements of 15 and 16 /38 and 40 5 cms fits approximately newborn to 6 months skill level easy 2 | gidday baby schematic gauge finished measurements inches/cms 22 stitches and 30 row/rounds = 4 inches in stocking stitch 22 stitches and 48 row/rounds = 4 inches in garter stitch it is advisable to swatch both flat and in the round and adjust a f b your needles accordingly to ensure you maintain a consistent gauge
